explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques, specifically LSTM-based recurrent neural networks, for trading support systems.
explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) in the proposed support system.
explanations.deep learning: The use of LSTM-based RNNs indicates the application of deep learning techniques in the research.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper specifically refers to the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) in the ensemble model for prediction.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper details the use of LSTM (long short-term memory) networks as part of the ensemble model for forecasting in exchange markets.
explanations.LSTM: The abbreviation LSTM is used in the abstract to describe the type of recurrent neural network employed in the support system.
